mapper.select: SELECT P.OWNERNUMBER,P.IMAG,P.SIGNUP,P.CONTENTS,S.* FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCK S ON P.OWNERNUMBER = S.OWNERNUMBER WHERE P.OWNERNUMBER=#{OWNERNUMBER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(OWNERNUMBER, NAME, IMAG, SIGNUP, CONTENTS) VALUES(#{ownernumber}, #{name}, #{imag}, SYSDATE, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as r,tt.* from (select distinct t.ownernumber,t.name,t.imag,t.signup,s.type,s.price from (select ownernumber,name,imag,signup from product) t left join stock s on t.ownernumber = s.ownernumber order by t.signup desc) tt) ttt where r between (#{page}-1)*12+1 and (#{page}-1)*12+12
